name: Toriga
description:
I wanted to see if I could code a game from start to finish, no matter how broken it would end up to be.

This is the end result. I've spent roughly four weeks on this. It has some pretty big design issues but I like it as it is :)

THE GAME:

This is a quick and short 2d retro shmup game I coded on Gamemaker 2. Control scheme is simple: use the mouse to move the ship, spam the left click button to shoot.
